description: Take sum of squares of digits of previous term.
references: R. Honsberger, Ingenuity in Math., Random House, 1970, p. 83.
A. Porges, A set of eight numbers, Amer. Math. Monthly, 52 (1945), 379-382.
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1).
formula: Periodic with period 8.a(n)=A000218(n+1). - _R. J. Mathar_, May 24 2008a(n)=A080709(n-2) for n>4. [From _M. F. Hasler_, May 24 2009]
prog: Contribution from _M. F. Hasler_, May 24 2009: (Start)(PARI) /* The given terms have been checked as follows: */a=[/* paste the terms here */]; k=3; vector(#a,n,k=A003132(k))==a/* PARI code: */ A008463(n)=[9,81,65,61,37, 58,89,145,42,20,4,16][if(n>12,(n-5)%8+5,n)]/* This code has been checked as follows: */ k=3;vector(99,n,k=A003132(k))==vector(99,n,A008463(n)) \\\\ (End)
